title: Spirit of the Hills
medium: oil on canvas mounted on painted plywood panel
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the friends and family of Henry Oliver, Jr.
provenance_text: Cloyd H. Marvin, Washington, D. C., c. 1944; Mrs. Cloyd Marvin, until her death, 1977; Robert G. Simmons, c. 1977; Robert Schoelkopf Gallery, New York, by 1978; Museum purchase: gift of the friends and family of Henry Oliver, Jr., 1978

creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
